name: Broken Sword - the Serpent's Curse Adventure
blurb: A new, original, Broken Sword game by Charles Cecil. Join the adventure and help us create the best Broken Sword game ever.

rewards.reward:
BROKEN SWORD SUPPORTER: 
• Download of 'Broken Sword - the Serpent's Curse' - PC & Mac 
• Regular Developer Diaries, Ideas Exchange Forum & Video Updates 
• Access to Exclusive Digital Content: Game Artwork (inc. posters and wallpaper); and Director's commentary on previous Broken Sword games & Archive Videos

BROKEN SWORD MEMBER: All above rewards plus:\r\n\u2022  High Resolution digital Comic Books of 'Broken Sword - the Serpent's Curse', 'Broken Sword: Director's Cut', and 'Broken Sword - the Smoking Mirror: Remastered' \u2022 History of Broken Sword eBook \u2022 'Broken Sword - the Serpent's Curse' digital Concept Art - character sheets, layouts etc. \u2022 Game's digital Soundtrack \u2022 Copy of any one previous Revolution game on GOG.com (Broken Sword or otherwise - PC only)

BROKEN SWORD SILVER MEMBER: All above rewards plus: \r\n\u2022 Exclusive digital game design content: Scripts of 'Broken Sword:Director's Cut', 'Broken Sword - the Smoking Mirror: Remastered', and 'Broken Sword - the Serpent's Curse' \u2022 Game Design Document for 'Broken Sword - the Serpent's Curse' \u2022 Archive of Game Design Documents for previous games \u2022 All Revolution Games titles on GOG.com: 'Broken Sword 1 - 4', 'In Cold Blood', 'Lure of the Temptress' & 'Beneath a Steel Sky' (PC only) \u2022 \u2018Broken Sword Silver Member\u2019 Credit in the game!

BROKEN SWORD GOLD MEMBER - All above rewards plus: \u2022 Boxed Kickstarter special edition of the Game, includes: CD / DVD game with full packaging; printed Comic of 'Broken Sword - the Serpent's Curse', 'Broken Sword: Director's Cut' & 'Broken Sword - the Smoking Mirror: Remastered'; Large game Poster; CD of soundtrack; & Kickstarter Backer T-Shirt  (shipping in US, EU and UK included) \u2022 Early access to digital Music Soundtrack \u2022 \u2018Broken Sword Gold Member\u2019 Credit in the game!

BROKEN SWORD PLATINUM MEMBER - All above rewards plus: \u2022 Your box signed by key team members and Rolf Saxon \u2022 Printed copy of the Game Design Document \u2022 \u2018Broken Sword Platinum Member\u2019 Credit in the game!

BROKEN SWORD KNIGHT -  All above rewards plus: \u2022 Printed copy of Game Design Document signed by the Director \u2022 Signed 'History of Broken Sword'  color Book \u2022 Templar Keyring Pendant \u2022 Signed Comic Book of 'Broken Sword: the Serpent\u2019s Curse' \u2022 Private invite to Code Jam once per month \u2013 ask questions and get live answers! \u2022 'Knight of the Broken Sword' credit in the game!

BROKEN SWORD KNIGHT COMMANDER - All above rewards plus: \u2022 Signed limited edition Kickstarter Backer Certificate \u2022 Signed Poster  \u2022 Nico's "La Liberte" Reporter's Notebook! \u2022 Signed limited edition George and Nico Print \u2022 'Broken Sword: Knight Commander' Credit in the game!

BROKEN SWORD KNIGHT SENESCHAL - All above rewards plus: \u2022 Personal written message from Charles Cecil \u2022 Early backers' access to game assets \u2022 Special Kickstarter Broken Sword Hoodie \u2013 wrap around color, fantastic! \u2022 Broken Sword baseball cap \u2022 \u2018Broken Sword: Knight Seneschal\u2019 Credit in the game!

BROKEN SWORD KNIGHT MASTER - All above rewards plus: \u2022 Personal Voicemail Message from George or Nico \u2022 Invitation to Launch Party in UK (excludes travel and accommodation) \u2022 A unique Drawing of you, in a suitable pose, with either George or Nico (your choice) \u2022 Broken Sword Knight Master Jacket \u2013 wrap around color, ultra high quality! \u2022  'Broken Sword: Knight Master' Credit in the game!

BROKEN SWORD GRAND MASTER - All above rewards plus: \u2022 Broken Sword Grandmaster Jacket (replaces 'Knight Master' jacket) \u2013 wrap around color as above, best quality \u2013 the ultimate! \u2022 Original pencil Storyboard Sheets (option to be signed) \u2022 Exclusive high quality Aluminum-printed Poster \u2022 Lunch and Studio Tour plus hands-on sneak peek of game in development (includes accommodation but not travel) \u2022 Invitation to the Wrap Party in exotic game location with key team members (includes accommodation but not travel) \u2022 All Broken Sword Grandmasters are drawn into the game in a group photo, that George and Nico can get a close up of and comment on! \u2022 'Broken Sword: Grand Master' Credit in the game!
